Vehicle.Name: StarViper M-2
Vehicle.Description: [H3]StarViper M-2[h3] The StarViper M-2 is an aftermarket modification of the infamous MandalMotors space superiority starfighter. It possesses a distinctive profile, with four wings radiating from a central cockpit like the fins of a beautiful yet deadly ocean creature. Two “arms” extend from the cockpit, each holding a pair of weapons. The arms can swing forward and backward, enhancing targeting capability and even allowing the pilot to fire behind the ship. [P]The M-2 modification boasts improved versatility at the expense of raw killing power. The heavy laser cannons have been reduced in potency to save power for the StarViper’s boosted shields, while still leaving the craft with a potent punch. More importantly, the proton torpedo launchers have been replaced with a pair of ion cannons, making the fighter popular among pirates and criminal consortiums.
